conbody.p: The water heaters covered by this manual may be installed in a Direct Vent configuration using a concentric termination or a low-profile termination.
Concentric and Low-Profile terminations must be ordered separately. Contact your local distributor or call the parts department phone number listed on the back cover of this manual to order.
The following are the part numbers for the different pipe diameters:

ul.li: Four-Inch Concentric Termination # 100111100 (used for both three- and four-inch diameter piping
